instance.description: Dataset of 38 worms from 'Brain-wide representations of behavior spanning multiple timescales and states in C. elegans'. Each NWB file contains the NIR bright-field images, GCaMP images, and NeuroPAL structural images, ROI locations and IDs, labeled activity traces, and behavioral information.
